
######################################

######################################


#leader_trait_adaptable_2 #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_adaptable_2_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_adaptable_2 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_adaptable_2
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = None }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_trigger = yes
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_adaptable }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_adaptable_2 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_adaptable_2_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_adaptable_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_adaptable_2
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_adaptable_2 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_effect = yes
        }
    }
}

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_trigger = yes

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no

    effect = {

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_defence_engineer_2 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_effect = yes }
    }
}

        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_defence_engineer_2 }

        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_effect = yes }

    }
    effect = {
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = trait_ruler_destroyer_focus }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = commander ID = trait_ruler_destroyer_focus }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_trait_ruler_destroyer_focus_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = trait_ruler_destroyer_focus }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_trait_ruler_destroyer_focus
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = trait_ruler_destroyer_focus }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_effect = yes
        }
    }
}


#trait_ruler_eye_for_talent_2 #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_trait_ruler_eye_for_talent_2_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_eye_for_talent_2 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_trait_ruler_eye_for_talent_2
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = None }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_trigger = yes
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = trait_ruler_eye_for_talent }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = commander ID = trait_ruler_eye_for_talent_2 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_effect = yes }
    }
}

        ruler = { has_trait = trait_ruler_eye_for_talent_2 }
    }

        }
    }

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes

    }

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = trait_ruler_from_the_ranks_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_trait_ruler_from_the_ranks_3
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = trait_ruler_from_the_ranks_3 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_effect = yes
        }
    }
}


#trait_ruler_military_pioneer_3 #veteran trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_trait_ruler_military_pioneer_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_military_pioneer_3 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_trait_ruler_military_pioneer_3
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = None }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = trait_ruler_military_pioneer }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = commander ID = trait_ruler_military_pioneer_3 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_trait_ruler_military_pioneer_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = trait_ruler_military_pioneer_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_trait_ruler_military_pioneer_3
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = trait_ruler_military_pioneer_3 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_effect = yes
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_armorer } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_armorer
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = subclass_commander_councilor }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_armorer }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_armorer }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_2_effect = yes }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_armorer }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_armorer
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_armorer }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_2_effect = yes
        }
    }
}

        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_2_effect = yes }

    }
